As COO and Executive Vice President, Mark Boyer guides the companyâ€™s execution and strategic direction. Since his appointment to COO in 2000, Mark has played a key role in ensuring operational excellence company-wide. Mark initially joined Summit Energy in 1995 to lead the energy risk management group and to manage client accounts.

Mark started his energy career at EnTrade Corporation, first selling natural gas to industrial end-users and ultimately leading EnTrade’s wholesale gas marketing effort until that company’s sale to Tenneco (El Paso) in 1993. Mark then co-founded APB Energy, focusing on the brokerage of energy risk management products.
